posts.name: Frank Pepe Pizzeria Napoletana
posts.note: Frank Pepe Pizzeria Napoletana is a casual local pizzeria chain serving a menu of coal-fired pies, beer, and wine since 1925. Oder the clam pizza along with original cheese and sauce.

posts.name: O'Rourke's Diner
posts.note: O'Rourke's Diner is a landmark diner (since 1941) serves creative American classics and Irish dishes for both breakfast and lunch. Order any of the hashes, French roasts, or the steamed burger and one-year-old aged cheddar on a toasted roll.
